description: This file demonstrates how to use the weave library to log model calls, including setup instructions, imports, and a sample function to run an agent with a model.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with a model, configured with parameters like model, markdown, and debug mode.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class representing an OpenAI chat model with a specific ID.

methods.name: run
methods.description: A function decorated with weave.op() that takes a string content and uses the agent to run it.
